reviews.customers_say: Customers find this sweater perfect for ugly sweater parties and appropriate for the Christmas season, with positive feedback about its quality, comfort, and warmth.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Sweater
items.body: Beautiful sweater! Gorgeous buttons. Unfortunately the sweater is too small, so I have to return, but it is BEAUTIFUL! Read more
items.author: LSUFran

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A bright, fun, warm, and merry Ugly Christmas!
items.body: This sweater is SUPER WARM! It’s very thick and feels like it cost twice what it actually did and came from a fancy department store. The pattern and colors were exactly as depicted, bright and cheerful and festive. It takes “Ugly Christmas Sweater” to new levels of quality, comfort, and cuteness. Yes, it’s “ugly” but in a cute, fun way. I especially loved that it has pockets - I always appreciate pockets! I got this right before Christmas Day, so I didn’t get to wear it much, but next year I’ll be wearing this every chance I get from Thanksgiving to Christmas. I’ll pair it with jeans, trousers, skirts, and my favorite, little black swing dresses. Since it has pockets, I can wear the dresses and skirts that don’t! I usually either avoid wearing them or layer on a cardigan for the pockets, that’s how much I love pockets. I happen to have an awesome a-line patchwork skirt made with vertical panels cut from other Ugly Christmas Sweaters. With a white blouse underneath, this is the perfect way to maximize the amount of Ugly Christmas Sweater on my person! Finish with my UCS headband, and a light-up necklace of Christmas lights, and it’s a very cute “ugly” Christmas! Read more
items.author: Meglet

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great quality- fits a little big
items.body: Sweater was just delivered! I'm 5'4, 130 lbs and always wear a size small. After reading reviews I decided to order the small. I'm pretty surprised that it fits a little big. It's more in the width than in the length. The length if the sweater is great it just isn't as fitted as it appears in the pictures, which is why I'm giving it 4 stars. For example, the sleeves hit me perfectly (about an inch passed my wrists) but the width seems they were taken from a large sweater. It's not a deal breaker, though, just not what I was expecting. The quality if the sweater is great; very thick and great for the winter. I also love that it has pockets! It will look great with black leggings and black knee-high boots! Read more
items.author: Marietc1

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super impressed with this soft, cozy sweater
items.body: I thought I might be rolling the dice ordering a sweater on Amazon, but I was pleasantly surprised! The sweater is high quality, thick, and soft. The colors are vibrant, just like the photos. I've been enjoying wearing it for festive occasions this holiday season! Read more
items.author: Michelle

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Abrasive llamas
items.body: The quality of the sweater is good. I took two stars away because I would say that it does run small, and also (the primary problem I have with it) is that the shimmery glittery fabric grabs the other fabric. For instance if I go to take a drink and my arm touches my chest at all, it kind of grabs the fabric. I have been wearing it all day, and both arms are now looking very fuzzy and snagged. Read more
items.author: carlyann13

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best holiday sweater!!!
items.body: I LOVE this sweater and I have received so many compliments when I wear it!! Absolutely beautiful!! Read more
items.author: Sally

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Try to be careful with the sizes
items.body: It felt good, but the sizing was wrong Read more
items.author: Donna R.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Vibrant, Flattering, and Perfect for the Holidays
items.body: The V28 Ugly Christmas Sweater has completely transformed my holiday wardrobe. I’ve worn it to several parties already, and every single time, I’ve been showered with compliments. Design: The bold, bright colors on the black background are nothing short of stunning. The contrast makes the pattern pop in the best way, drawing attention without being overbearing. The reindeer motif is charming and festive, striking the perfect balance between fun and elegance. Fit and Style: This sweater isn’t just festive—it’s flattering. I was amazed by how the cut and fit gave me a slimming effect. It hugs in just the right places without feeling tight, making it comfortable and stylish at the same time. Who knew a holiday sweater could make you feel so confident? Quality: The knit feels substantial yet soft, and it holds up beautifully after washing. There’s no pilling or loose threads, which speaks to its high-quality construction. This sweater feels like it was designed to last for many Christmases to come. Final Thoughts: This sweater is everything I wanted and more—a perfect blend of festive charm and flattering design. It’s an absolute must-have for the holiday season! Read more
items.author: Toysareus

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Cardigan C Black, Cardigan Snowman Black, Cardigan Snowman Red, Cardigan B. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
